title: Speedvagen: Titanium Ichico Blast and Ingrid Rugged Road Package – Speedvagen
content:
If there is one thing this year has taught us, it is that we need to embrace the alternative now more than ever. With a parts shortage and global pandemic, this year has tossed all it had at us. Instead of going silent and resting on what we have built, we decided to push harder and be more creative than ever, launching a bike every single month, despite these challenges. This led us to full year of trying new parts, new finishes, and having more fun, which is what this is supposed to be all about right?…

With that idea in mind it was time to officially embrace Ti and put it officially on the SV menu (and website) To do so we wanted to put together a special build package. The bike was an obvious choice, no bike would embrace the alternative more than a mostly raw metal Ti Speedvagen Rugged Road.

When it comes to parts we are big fans of what Ingrid Components is doing out of Italy. Super unique style and so functional. Their parts take the Rugged Road up a notch in terms of how capable it can be!

The September build. 

While we have officially added custom titanium bikes to our website after a few years of offering them secret menu style, we are only offering 11 bikes in this complete limited package. As this is a custom build package some changes are allowed.

-Only 11 completes available (chose your paint color).
-Custom Ti Rugged Road Frame Sets start $7100.00
-Wheels: Your  choice of Enve rims.
-Ingrid 12 Speed Kit
-Ingrid Road Crank-Set with 38t, 40t, 42t chainring.
-Ingrid – Rear Derailluer
-Ingrid – 10-48 Cassette
-Campy Super Record Shifters/Brakes
-Saddle: Fabric Scoop
-Stem: Enve
-Bar: Enve
-Enve Carbon Seat tube comes standard.
-Seat post head: Enve Carbon Seatpost Head.
-Headset: Chris King
-Bottom Bracket: Chris King

Plus, all of the features of our Ti Speedvagen frames including integrated carbon seat mast, super-light Ti tubing, and strategically placed stainless reinforcements. Shazam!

See more at Speedvagen.
